raw_comment: i noticed that below and above right at 50% is higher. meanning the middle class people have a lower chance that the upper or lower class. i wonder what the reason for this is, does it matter what generation the family member came from? this relates to me because having this knowledge is important when appying to college.
ace_sentences: I noticed that the value below 50% is higher than the value at 50%.
I noticed that the value above 50% is higher than the value at 50%.
This means that middle-class people have a lower chance than upper-class people.
This means that middle-class people have a lower chance than lower-class people.
I wonder what the reason for this is.
I ask whether the generation of a family member matters.
This knowledge is important for me.
This knowledge is important when I apply to college.
